it's true that no one likes aram. we just play it because it's better than dealing with people in a 5v5 summoners rift. 3v3's are nice though.

just sucks that bots talk too now. they say lame things. used to it was anyone's guess. NOW it's like they admit it.

ARAM is for those moments where it's 11:40 and you and your friends are willing to play 1 more game.

ARAM accounting is too common to enjoy playing it for long periods of time.
On one hand you should just die to help your team, on the other hand you have to go for the secret ARAM achievement of most gold accumulated and least deaths. Hmm.

> [{quoted}](name=Raven Redeemed,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rnWEGEmv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-21T00:07:04.655+0000)
>
> On one hand you should just die to help your team, on the other hand you have to go for the secret ARAM achievement of most gold accumulated and least deaths. Hmm.

This reminds me of a post I saw long ago in Player Behavior and Moderation. There was this guy playing Warwick who went 7/0/5 or something (most kills and least deaths) and lost. He was reported and but not punished, but he made a thread about how toxic everyone was to him in that game.
He got some sympathy on the Boards because trying not to die is something that is smart to do in League of Legends, but he also got flamed really hard by Boards members ("I would have reported you too, you were such a liability to your team and you were the reason they lost") because people said that because he didn't die, he had the plurality of the team's gold and did nothing with it, and since he was playing Warwick and was not dying, he was probably playing way too safe and not doing much.

It was an interesting scenario, really. I was more inclined to side with the side that agreed with him, but I understood completely why people would be mad at him.
My answer to that is "who cares, it's ARAM" I always build weird stuff like AS Nunu or adc Janna
https://media.tenor.co/images/cf6505816ec6c5f1e0c15023262014e1/tenor.gif

One time, I got Lulu. Started boots and a Sheen... literally never died until the very end, despite being like 24/0. Came back literally full build with like 800 AP and one shot them all and won the game. xD

Revenge tastes purple.
I once went 13/0/46 on Ashe on ARAM before, I was so tempted to suicide

http://imgur.com/a/b10e3?noredirect

I HAVE THE PERFECT GAME HERE.
TOO FAB TO DIE.

i loved that. get morg or lux, but tear and potions and boots, destroy the enemy team and live for 3/4 the match before you die. come back with 3 full items or more and the enemy be like: "oh $h*t" shouldn't have killed THAT guy.
